[console_scripts]
santiq = santiq.cli.main:app

[santiq.extractors]
csv_extractor = santiq.plugins.extractors.csv_extractor:CSVExtractor
excel_extractor = santiq.plugins.extractors.excel_extractor:ExcelExtractor
json_extractor = santiq.plugins.extractors.json_extractor:JSONExtractor

[santiq.loaders]
csv_loader = santiq.plugins.loaders.csv_loader:CSVLoader
excel_loader = santiq.plugins.loaders.excel_loader:ExcelLoader
json_loader = santiq.plugins.loaders.json_loader:JSONLoader

[santiq.profilers]
basic_profiler = santiq.plugins.profilers.basic_profiler:BasicProfiler

[santiq.transformers]
basic_cleaner = santiq.plugins.transformers.basic_cleaner:BasicCleaner
